title: [new client bug] can't select runes/masteries in champion select
body:
am in soloq champ select and I can't select my rune/masteries when I click on the drop-down bar, nothing comes up.

I could however fix this with my masteries by pressing on the mastery editor button to the left of the dropdowns

prob a problem on mac client only

http://imgur.com/a/gWUOG    screenshots

replies.body: wow that seems like a big issue, maybe that's why the ranked queue is down right now.

Happened to me yesterday and today, got stuck with support runes as jungler
Using windows
